LanguageData.ExtractSnakeVenomGland.label: extract snake venom gland
LanguageData.ExtractSnakeVenomGland.description: Butchers a snake to obtain the venom gland which can then be turned into venom vials.
LanguageData.ExtractMegaSpiderVenomGland.label: extract megaspider venom gland
LanguageData.ExtractMegaSpiderVenomGland.description: Butchers a megaspider to obtain the venom gland which can then be turned into venom vials.
LanguageData.CraftMegaSpiderVenomVile.label: craft megaspider venom vial
LanguageData.CraftMegaSpiderVenomVile.description: Eletrocutes snake venom vials changing there chemical compund to that similiar of megaspider venom. Once changed it can be used to craft a cure to megaspider paralysis.
LanguageData.InjectSnakeVenomAntibody.label: inject snake venom antivenom
LanguageData.InjectSnakeVenomAntibody.description: Injects snake venom antivenom into patient.
LanguageData.InjectMegaspiderParalysisAntibody.label: inject megaspider paralysis antivenom
LanguageData.InjectMegaspiderParalysisAntibody.descri: Injects megaspider paralysis antivenom into patient.
LanguageData.AllowInhalationOfSnakeVenomHealingVapour: allow inhalation of snake venom healing vapours
Allows the inhalation of snake venom healing vapours to an incapacitated patient.
Allowing the inhalation of snake venom healing vapours.
